channel.title: Dragon Kite Sheild Revealed!
channel.description:
Ok i know everyone is gonna say this is a p server your right it is but im making a point about the d kite and how lazy jagex is!!! take a look at these pics that i took on my p server of the d sq halfs as you notice they are laying on ground... Wait it should make a d sq but wait it doesnt. What your tellin me if i drop a d sq left half and a d sq right half it doesnt look like a d sq. Yes i am heres the proof :D
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/sq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/dsq.jpg[/img]
Now that youve seen it what do you think :D hehe i think jagex is lazy all they need to do is add a 3d shape to their pic and boom add to game :P
